children.text: Subtle strength. Timeless style. The
Sportsman

F-150 package is built for those who appreciate clean lines and real capability. With just the right mix of premium features and rugged readiness, this truck is equally at home cruising the streets or chasing trails — wherever your next adventure leads.

documents.excerpt: Balanced for both off-road and daily driving, this package features a 2.5" lift, 20" wheels with 285/60R20 all-terrain tires, and integrated TSport styling accents.

vehicleDetailsPageHeaderBackgroundImage.alt: Balanced for both off-road and daily driving, this package features a 2.5″ lift, 20″ wheels with 285/60R20 all-terrain tires, and integrated TSport styling accents.

coverImage.alt: two jeep wranglers are parked on top of a hill at sunset .

children.text: Alpine's acoustic mastery and Rebel Off Road's legendary off-road engineering have joined forces, giving rise to an unparalleled series of custom Jeep® vehicles. To bring these visionary builds to life, they entrusted the skilled artisans at Timberline Upfitters to execute the premium installation and intricate customization.

Every detail, from the sophisticated audio integration to the exclusive vehicle add-ons, was meticulously brought to life by Timberline Upfitters' technical team. The result is a fleet where boundary-pushing sound meets uncompromising off-road performance, crafted to the highest standard.
These landmark builds are not merely for display; they are available for acquisition. This is a rare opportunity to own a vehicle born from a collaboration of industry leaders.

documents.excerpt: Alpine & Rebel Off Road’s visionary builds, brought to life by Timberline Upfitters' expert installation, redefine adventure and audio. Experience the fusion.
documents.name: Alpine

primaryLogo.alt: the word milan is written in blue on a black background .

documents.description: Ford is a leader in passenger and commercial vehicle manufacturers.
documents.name: Ford

coverImage.alt: a white ram truck is parked in a rocky area built by TimberlineUpfitters

children.text: Timberline Upfitters builds adventure-ready vehicles for off-road enthusiasts, blending precision, performance, and style. Each build starts with a proven off-road foundation that customers can tailor to their goals.
Choose
Trailhead
or
Overlook
— the same platform at different ride heights — then personalize with recommended accessories for your ideal setup.
Prefer a turnkey build?
Waypoint
and
NorthTrail
offer fully curated, ready-to-roll configurations designed and assembled by Timberline.

documents.excerpt:
Timberline Upfitters — Adventure Ready Off-road Builds builds for every explorer.

Trailhead & Overlook — pick your ride height, we match the tires, then add your favorite accessories.
Waypoint & NorthTrail — pre-curated, turn-key builds with no changes, crafted by Timberline.

Your ride. Your adventure. Built to perform.
documents.name: Timberline

coverImage.alt: TSPORT F-150 close up of the side of a truck parked in a parking lot

children.text: TSport + Timberline Upfitters (previously Southern Off-Road Specialists) is Georgia’s premier shop for trucks, jeeps, suspension lift kits, and all things off-road! With a premier upfit shop located in Cumming, Georgia TLU is a family-owned and operated business. Our primary shop started building lifted trucks, Jeeps, and SUVs for customers in the Alpharetta and Cumming area in May of 2000. Our goal is to provide great-driving, customized vehicles tailored for each customer. Top-quality products with professional installation make our customers’ vehicles safe, fun to drive, and look incredible.

documents.excerpt: Partnering with Southern Off-Road Specialists, the TSPORT line of trucks is Built Ford Tough. Focusing on the F-150 and SuperDuty platforms, we’ve crafted custom trucks tailored to the needs of off-road lovers—from 6” suspension lift kits and BFGoodrich tires to digital-fit floor liners and center console storage vaults. These vehicles are designed to take on any adventure and are now available straight from the dealership!
documents.name: TSport
documents.slogan: Championship Winning Performance Engineered for Your Truck

children.text: The F-150 4x4 Sport combines legendary Ford toughness with aggressive sport styling. This build features performance-tuned suspension, upgraded exhaust, and exclusive exterior enhancements that make a bold statement on any terrain.
Built for the blacktop. Inspired by the TSport legacy, the
Sport Truck

package is a street-tuned powerhouse with a sleek, low-profile stance. Whether you’re cruising the strip or putting the hammer down, this truck delivers head-turning style and pavement-pounding performance every mile of the way.

documents.excerpt: These trucks pack enough features and can-do attitude to take on whatever adventure comes your way – on or off-road.

children.text: Package Includes:

2/4" Lowering Kit, 22x9.5" WHEELS, 305/40/R22 Toyo Proxes ST Tires, ROAD FORCE MOUNT AND BALANCE, FOUR WHEEL ALIGNMENT, SPEEDOMETER CALIBRATION, 3D BADGING, WARRANTY PORTFOLIO AND PROFESSIONAL INSTALLATION PREMIUM CUSTOM LEATHER CUSTOM EXHAUST: MAGNAFLOW WITH BLACK TIPS Air Design Hood Scoop

2/4" Lowering Kit, 22x9.5" WHEELS, 305/40/R22 Toyo Proxes ST Tires, ROAD FORCE MOUNT AND BALANCE, FOUR WHEEL ALIGNMENT, SPEEDOMETER CALIBRATION, 3D BADGING, WARRANTY PORTFOLIO AND PROFESSIONAL INSTALLATION BODY SIDE MOLDINGS, AND REAR CAB SPOILER ALL PAINTED TO MATCH (NOT AVAILABLE ON SPORTSMAN) PREMIUM CUSTOM LEATHER CUSTOM EXHAUST: MAGNAFLOW WITH BLACK TIPS Air Design Hood Scoop Satin Black Hi Hat

children.text: Proud. Purpose-built.
Valor

brings aggressive styling with everyday drivability — the perfect blend of form and function. Designed for lifted-truck enthusiasts who demand more, this package delivers a factory-fresh build with a custom attitude that’s anything but average.

The Valor package includes the aggressive yet practical styling that lifted-truck enthusiasts look for. This is the ideal aftermarket spec list, straight from the factory.

documents.excerpt: A more aggressive lift package with 6″ suspension, 20″ wheels, 35″ all-terrain tires, TSport graphics, and optional speedometer calibration.
